pageContext.claim: “When you want to get money for a wall that most of the people in the Democrat Party wanted five years ago -- they just didn't like it when I announced that we were going to build it -- they were unable to get it built. They had the money, but they were unable to get it built because it takes talent to build things, and they don't have that talent. But we got it built.”
pageContext.analysis: No, the 2013 bill that included funding for an upgraded border wall was part of a comprehensive effort at immigration reform. The plan passed the Senate but did not get taken up by the GOP-controlled House at the time.
